morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action might or could happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person speaking or writing
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that maybe happens - by people or things that are speaking or writing
